thread.title: Six Stages of a Figure Skater's Skating Life
thread.title_full: Six Stages of a Figure Skater's Skating Life

title: Six Stages of a Figure Skater's Skating Life
text:
A Figure Skater Smiles With Her Coach. Photo by Jupiterimages - Getty Images Stage Six - Once a Skater, Always a Skater: 
Every person who once committed to figure skating will always remember the years he or she spent at the rink. Even though an individual might never again skate or train the way he or she may have in the past, something keeps drawing everyone who loves figure skating back to the sport. 
Those who are away from the sport for awhile, eventually come back in some capacity. They might return as a spectator, or as a participant, or as a skating official , coach, or volunteer. 
There seems to be nothing like the feeling of gliding, jumping, and spinning on the ice and every figure skater remembers that feeling. Also, those who skate, are almost magically linked in some way for life!
